quotes.quote: The true measure of friendship is not how you feel about someone, its how they make you feel about yourself.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Finding love is hard enough, why worry about what color that love is.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I've learned to not beat myself up about the fact that I dont't have a singular idea of what success is.
quotes.author: Grace Bonney

quotes.quote: Nothing can dim the light which shines from within.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Failure is success if we learn from it.
quotes.author: Malcolm S. Forbes

quotes.quote: Never put off till tomorrow the fun you can have today.
quotes.author: Aldows Huxley

quotes.quote: One of the best people you'll MEET in your life, is THE NEW YOU. Enbrace change and continue to grow.
quotes.author: D. Giles-Bey

quotes.quote: In the spirit of science, there really is no such thing as a FAILED EXPERIMENT. Any test that yields valid data is a valid test.
quotes.author: Adam Savage

quotes.quote: The HARDER I work, the LUCKIER I get
quotes.author: Gary Player

quotes.quote: Grace is the beauty of form under the influence of freedom.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller
